article.title: P2E Game Trend in 2023
article.first_section_desc_1: P2E games are planned to be released in 2023 as well as in 2022. However, the games that were launched in 2022 had their own limitations, so the games to be released in 2023 will come out with many improvements.
article.first_section_desc_2: Then, what problems did the existing P2E games have and how will they be solved in the new P2E games?
article.second_section_desc_1: The first is increased accessibility. There are two major obstacles to accessibility in current P2E games. One is that you must own NFTs to play, and the other is that you need a wallet to own NFTs. In contrast to Android games where you can directly access the game by simply logging in with Google or Apple, we think P2E games in 2023 will change so that you can play the game directly with social login regardless of having NFT.
article.second_section_desc_2: Games like Free to Play or Free to Own will be transformed into games that will be as easy to play as existing Android games. Tokens or NFTs obtained while playing the game can be owned by creating a wallet.
article.third_section_desc_1: Second, the NFT supply method will change. The supply of characters in P2E games can be viewed positively in that the user has received the authority producing characters, not the gaming company. However, the character supply method of P2E in 2022 is a breeding system where two parent characters create one child character. No matter how much you limit the number of breeding in this method, the number of characters increases exponentially over time, and there will be more supply than the characters users want.
article.third_section_desc_2: Since the character is not unique, the fun is halved and the number of users is gradually decreasing, which is also a factor that shortens the life of the game. Therefore, in P2E in 2023, users have the right to supply, but we think that the supply method of characters will diversify and new trends will emerge from it.
article.fourth_section_title: The last puzzle of the P2E game
article.fourth_section_desc_1: Last but not least, games should be fun. Existing P2E games are played to make money rather than for fun. There is also a tendency to call existing P2E games as GameFi in the form of combining games with finance.
article.fourth_section_desc_2: The games that will be reorganized in 2023 will come out with a purpose for game rather than money. Regardless of NFTs and tokens' price, it refers to games in which players buy in-game items and the number of players is large because the game is fun.
article.call_to_action: We, Fortress Arena, need a lot of gamers who genuinely love the game. If you want to make Fortress Arena a P2E Android trend game in 2023, please join us on Discord and give us your opinions.
